projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_idListMembers_v01.xml file.

div.p:
svasti śrī || tiripuvanacakkara
varttikaḷ śrīvirarājentirateva
ṟku yāṇṭu eḻāvatu śrīpātantā
ṅkum tirupaḷḷic civiyārkkuccāmu
tāyamkaruppūruṭaiyāṉ utaiyañce
ytāṉ tāḻiyāṉa coḷentiraci
ṅka viḻupparayaṉeṉ irājāti
rājavaḷanāṭṭup piramateyam
tirukkaḻumalattu uṭaiyār tirutto
ṇipuramuṭaiyarkkum periyanācciyār
kkum cantirātuttavarai aṭaikkāyamutu pā
kkum tevūr ilaiyamutu paṟṟum amutu cetaruḷa
nāṉ viṭṭa nilamāvatu iṉṉāṭṭu nāṅkūraṉa tiru
cciṟṟampalamuṭaiyār śrīpātatūḷiccarupvita
maṅkalattu teṉ piṭākai kiṭāraṅkoṇṭacoḻa
nalluril kāṇi uṭaiya poṉṉuḻāṉ aiyya
nampi uṭaiyāṉum tiruvāykkulamuṭaiyāṉ ai
yya nampiyum aiyya nampitevaṉum uḷḷiṭṭ
ār pakkal nāṉ peṟṟuṭaiyenāy eṉṉutāy varukiṟa ko
llai nilattukku melpāṟkellai kāṟai
kālukku kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai kāveri
kum tiruveṇkāṭṭumuka
ḷḷaiyār ilaiyamutu
tiruveṇkāṭṭumu
peru nāṉkellai
ṉ ātittaṉ nārāyaṇaṉ uyyakkoṇṭāṉ nilam iraṇṭu mācciṉṉamum ai
yya nampi uṭaiyāṉ irājarājapperuvilaikoṇṭu aṉupavikkiṟa nilam
muṉṟu māvum ivarkaḷ pakkal kaḷattūruṭaiyāṉ tāyilum nallāṉ vi
laikoṇṭu muṉpu ilaiyamutu toṭṭamāka viḷai
nilam eṭṭumāvum āka nilam araiye
muṉṟu mācciṉṉamum nikki nīkki niṉṟa eṉṉu
tāy varukiṟa nilam araiyum innilattu
opāti āṟiṭu paṭukaiyum potuvum po
tāriyuṅ kiṇaṟuṅ kuḷamum ma
ṟṟum epperppaṭṭa urimaika
ḷum akappaṭa vanta nilam ci
vanāmattukkāṇiyākakkai
kkoṇṭu iṟai iṟuttu i
ṟai mikutikku nittaṟpaṭi nāḷ o
ṉṟukku aṭaikkāyamutu pākku irunū
ṟum tevūr ilaiyamutu paṟṟu āṟum ni
tta nimantamāka cantirātittavarai c
ellak kaṭavatāka viṭṭuk kuṭutteṉ ka
ruppūr uṭaiyān uta
yañceytāṉ tāḻiyāṉa coḷentiraciṅka viḻupparāya
ṉeṉ itu śrīmāheśvara irakṣai||
